document_title: Rectal polyps: Causes, symptoms and prevention
subsection_content: Although most rectal polyps are benign, some have the potential to become malignant (cancerous). Therefore, the more rectal polyps a person has or the more large they are, the more they need to be careful, alert, and not subjective, because it can turn into cancer at any time. any.
subsection_title: polyp truc trang.json. Are rectal polyps dangerous?
subsection_data:
polyp truc trang.json. Are rectal polyps dangerous?
Although most rectal polyps are benign, some have the potential to become malignant (cancerous). Therefore, the more rectal polyps a person has or the more large they are, the more they need to be careful, alert, and not subjective, because it can turn into cancer at any time. any.
